ReferenceDocuments.description: Data Element Medical History Event Dictionary-Derived/Standardized Term does not have Preferred Question Text

ReferenceDocuments.name: MHDECOD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. The sponsor is expected to provide the dictionary name and version used to map the terms utilizing the Define-XML external codelist attributes. Sponsors should include an Origin in the define metadata document to indicate that the data was "ASSIGNED".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This is typically not a data collection field that will appear on the CRF. Sponsors will populate this through the coding process. Equivalent to the Preferred Term (PT in MedDRA).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2004425 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 02.13.23_Set Reg Status to Standard for all CDISC Aligned content_ghd
